name: Sherpani Sojourn Tote - Women's
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description: A convertible travel pack with features to keep you organized at home or abroad. You can carry it cross-body, as a tote or use the backpack straps to go hands-free. The padded sleeve holds a tablet or compact laptop and the RFID-protected pocket protects your data.Made of heathered polyester with a herringbone lining.DWR coating sheds rain and muck.Main compartment has a locking zipper and anti-slash bottom to protect your valuables.RFID-blocking pocket.Chair loop lets you secure it when not on your body.Padded laptop sleeve.1 interior slip pocket, 2 water-bottle pockets, external slip pockets (1 front, 2 back).
